title: Twenty One Pilots in Concert—As Roblox Avatars
sub_head: Fan favorites such as Ariana Grande and The Weeknd are reaching audiences through virtual performances, which are becoming more common and sophisticated
body:
Before kicking off a run of concerts in Denver at Bluebird Theater for Twenty One Pilots’ post-pandemic return to live music, the rock duo made a stop in a videogame platform.
Millions of fans logged on to Roblox over the span of a weekend to watch them perform as avatars.
